Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "new CellValue(bool) generates invalid XML" (#1070) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Description**

The introduced new CellValue(bool) uses the wrong serialization causing Excel to fail to load the file.

**Information**

- .NET Target: all
- DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: since 2.12-ish (https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/pull/782)

**Repro**

```csharp
Debug.Assert(new CellValue(true).InnerText == "true");
``` 

**Observed**

Spec expects the boolean values to be "true" or "false" but the code is using bool.ToString() which returns "True" or "False".

https://github.com/OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK/blob/main/src/DocumentFormat.OpenXml/Spreadsheet/CellValue.cs#L42

**Expected**

Per .NET remarks for the boolean.ToString:

This method returns the constants "True" or "False".

Note that XML is case-sensitive, and that the XML specification recognizes "true" and "false" as the valid set of Boolean values. If the string returned by the ToString() method is to be written to an XML file, its String.ToLowerInvariant method should be called first to convert it to lowercase.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "No symbols package on nuget.org for v2.14.0" (#1074) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Ref #639 - this seems to have regressed because there is no option on nuget.org to download symbols for version 2.14.0.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Remove internals to backend" (#1086) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Set additional libraries as shipping" (#1085) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Closed pull request "Use multiple PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files" (#1063) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: A recent update to the PublicAPI allows to merge multiple files into a single data source. Since the majority of the APIs in the SDK are shared, with only a few different due to framework issues, this greatly simplifies API management.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Add roadmap for 2022" (#1083) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Remove internals to backend" (#1086) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Set additional libraries as shipping" (#1085) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Use full qualified name in semantic validation" (#1084) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This may lead to some prefixes that are not correct, but it matches the
actual schematron items we use. This had been cleaned up on the backend,
but required loading the SDK file itself in order to do so. By breaking
that dependency, we must now do the same logic. This is being done in
the TryFindAttribute method and does the following:

- Check if there is an exact match. Returns that if found
- Find a match by name only as a back up

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed pull request "Add Examples" (#1080) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
